page.title: 02ARTS & CRAFTS BILLINGSHURST
page.content: LANNARDS GALLERY IS A WORKING STUDIO POTTERY WITH 2 POTTERS PRODUCING DOMESTIC STONEWARE WHICH IS EXHIBITED IN THE GALLERY. THE STONEWARE IS THROWN, BUT SOME TERRACOTTA IS PRODUCED. A VARIETY OF STONEWARE GLAZES ARE USED. THE CERAMICS ARE SHOWN AT CRAFT EXHIBITIONS.A POTTER BELONGS TO THE GUILD OF SUSSEX CRAFTSMEN. ALSO IN OUR AREA IS A GLASS ENGRAVER, WORKING AT HOME AS A HOBBY ON MAINLY DARTINGTON GLASS USING A VARIETY OF MONOGRAMS AND DESIGNS.SOME WORK IS COMMISSIONED. THE ENGRAVED GLASS IS EXHIIBITED AT HOME AND AT LOCAL CRAFT EXHIBITIONS.
